bio: I am a web developer with over 10 years of experience, always trying to implement cutting-edge technologies,  I provide comprehensive programming services for WEB platforms. I have moderate Photoshop experience, so I can easily work with your graphics designer and/or existing mockups and wireframes. I produce high-quality modular, re-usable, and upgradable code, which is something many of the lower-cost service providers often will not do, as I have learned from working cleanup on many outsourced projects. Being a domestic service provider, I provide an on-demand high-quality development service to clients interested in building long-term products with a solid foundation and a flexible framework for the future, without the communication headaches, logistical barriers, and quality control issues frequently associated with off-shore development.

abstrac: Passionate Digital Marketing Strategist helping business to grow their Online revenue
bio:
If your company has very specific needs that involve multiple skills on digital marketing, I'm the person you've been looking for.

I've been helping Real Estate agents, Health Care companies, Lawyers, Restaurants and many other businesses in the United States and Brazil since 2009.

Allow me to deliver to your company, in a timely and professional way, affordable digital marketing strategies that will drive not only traffic to your online business, but qualified leads and sales.

You can count on me to manage your digital marketing project from stem to stern - I'm open to communicate fluidly with you and the technical staff to accommodate your needs in technical reality. 

Please take a look at my Portfolio Website and ask me whatever questions you have, I'm here to help!

My 'Normal' workflow involves flexibility.

No matter what kind of business you're in, I have a way to deal with it.

Politeness and respect are my rules.

bio:
I am a freelance illustrator with flexible drawing styles.

I provide high quality drawing , illustration , and sketch .

STEP 1 :Send me the description of the artwork that you need to be done with any reference that you have (links/ images and etc.).  You can also add what styles you prefer.STEP 2 :I will create rough sketches based on the descriptions and references that you have given me.STEP 3 :if you need modifications on the sketches, I will make them again and send you modified sketches until you are satisfied.STEP 4 :after all the sketches, we proceed to coloring. At this point, you can suggest the color themes you want.STEP 5 :I will then send the final files after payment.
